condition: doc.status == "Approval Pending by Vice Dean for GSA" or doc.status == "Approval Pending by Department Head" or doc.status == "Approval Pending by Department Council" or doc.status == "Approval Pending by College Dean" or doc.status == "Approval Pending by College Council"
message: Suspend enrollment request "{{doc.name}}" pending approval by you with reason: "{{doc.reason}}" for "{{doc.suspend_period}}".
name: New Suspend Enrollment Request Notification for All Email

recipients.condition: doc.status == "Approval Pending by Vice Dean for GSA"

subject: New Suspend Enrollment Request ({{doc.name}}) Pending Approval.
